integration_patterns: RESTful APIs for cloud services integration
ETL processes using Azure Data Factory
Message queues for real-time data streaming with AWS SQS

evidence.claim: Company uses AWS Lambda for serverless architecture.
Firm prioritizes HIPAA compliance for all data handling.
Supports FHIR for interoperability with EHR systems.
Utilizes Azure SQL for backend data storage and processing.
Employs X12 transaction standards for insurance claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Company uses X12 transactions and supports healthcare data integration, indicating API-first focus.
